questions.question: Where do you put Magnus Carlsen, the current world champion in the list of all time greats?
You ask, you know, soccer fans, so who is your favorite, Pele, Maradona, or Messi?
What lessons do you draw from the rise and fall of the Soviet Union in the 20th century?
If you can go back and relive a single moment in your life, what would that moment be?
